title: Curry Shack
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An open air shack that offers currys. The kitchen is in the back and patrons get a full view of the food being cooked. The owner hands you a menu, a piece of paper, and a pen, and you are expected to write your order and hand it back to him. All the curries (green, red, Masaman, Indian, Panang, kua, and the daily special) have a vegetarian option. Directions: take the Walking Street towards the river, when the street begins a downhill slope notice the alley called Thedsaban Soi 2, there is a sign on the post at the top of the alley, walk down about 30 metres, and Curry Shack will be on the left.
